title: Man (level 4)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Men are citizens of West Ardougne. They are similar to men found throughout RuneScape, but can only be attacked and talked to, and not pickpocketed. Their appearance is slightly different, in keeping with the theme of West Ardougne supposedly being afflicted with a plague, and their dialogue is slightly different, reflecting their plight under Mourner rule.

Men are citizens of West Ardougne. They are similar to men found throughout RuneScape, but can only be attacked and talked to, and not pickpocketed. Their appearance is slightly different, in keeping with the theme of West Ardougne supposedly being afflicted with a plague, and their dialogue is slightly different, reflecting their plight under Mourner rule.

They are found near the civilians, children, and women, as well as other non-attackable men.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 July –
19 September 2005

The NPCs examines were changed from "One of RuneScapes'[sic] many citizens." to "One of RuneScape's many citizens."

29 March 2004 –
20 February 2006 		20 February 2006 –
present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • There is an unused variant of the Man who cannot be spoken to or attacked. Unlike the normal variant, he was not graphically updated when the Plague City quest was reworked in 2006.
